news.title: Watch: Trump speaks at Davos as Greenland push, tariff threats take center stage
news.summary: Trump said over the weekend that he would slap tariffs on imports from eight European countries. The move is in retaliation for moving troops to Greenland.

news.title: Berkshire prepares to exit 28% stake in Kraft Heinz as new CEO aims to move on from rare Buffett gaffe
news.summary: . The move underscores Abel's willingness to look past a deal that has long stood out as a rare blemish in Buffett's otherwise storied record.

news.title: Scott Bessent says U.S. is unconcerned by Treasury sell-off over Greenland, calls Denmark ‘irrelevant’
news.summary: U.S. treasury secretary Scott Bessant addressed reporters at a press conference at the World Economic Forum on Wednesday. He said the U.S.'s role in the world was to be seen as a role model for the world.

news.title: Mortgage refinances surged again, but rates are now suddenly jumping higher
news.summary: Mortgage refinancing jumped sharply higher for the second straight week, as interest rates fell further. But that boom may be about to bust.

news.title: OpenEvidence, the 'ChatGPT for doctors,' doubles valuation to $12 billion
news.summary: OpenEvidence, based in Massachusetts, has topped a $12 billion valuation in a funding round led by Thrive and DST. OpenEvidence is a cloud-based data analysis and analysis company.

news.title: Kraft Heinz’s stock sinks as Berkshire Hathaway may sell off its large stake
news.summary: The food giant is in the process of unraveling its 2015 merger between Kraft Foods and Heinz. It intends to split into two publicly traded companies.

news.title: Sorry, ‘Dr. Google.’ ChatGPT and Claude are now getting into the business of providing health advice.
news.summary: OpenAI and Anthropic are moving into the complicated world of health information. Will ChatGPT help or hurt patient health? The company is working on a chatbot that will help doctors and patients exchange information.

news.title: Small stocks have crushed big ones this year, but that may just be a mirage
news.summary: Small-cap investors are convinced the stock-market tide has turned in their favor. They are convinced that the economy is set to perform well in 2014.

news.title: United’s perks and loyalty strategy pays off, as its stock surges after earnings
news.summary: United Airlines reports better-than-expected profits for the holiday quarter. The airline says its focus on loyal fliers is paying off and that “strong momentum” continued into the new year.

news.title: This is the secret to spending money with no regrets, says the guy who wrote the book on it
news.summary: Morgan Housel has a strategy for your finances that works regardless of what the economy does. Author Morgan Housel is the author of the book "Finance for a Lifetime"
